duties_responsibilities.duty: Read and interpret mechanical/electrical drawings and procedures.
Interface with customer/Government source inspection personnel.
Maintenance of inspection records in accordance with company procedures.
Generate and assist in the corrective/preventive action process.
Understand and support the Quality Management System.
Perform other duties as requested, directed, or assigned.

education_certification.credential: American Society for Quality (ASQ) Certified Quality Inspector (CQI)
Three - Five (3-5) years of manufacturing experience.
